apple_vendor_description: This heartwarming emoji on Apple devices displays two people holding hands, one with a medium-light skin tone and the other with a medium skin tone, brought to life with Appleâ€™s renowned glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting. Their hands are intertwined with soft rounded edges, symbolizing unity, friendship, and companionship. The smooth gradients and warm highlights beautifully convey a sense of togetherness and support, making it a perfect choice for expressing closeness and solidarity in any message.
